name: Convex Reinvest
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) to earn CRV and CVX (and any other available tokens). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Convex Reinvest
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) to earn CRV and CVX (and any other available tokens). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Convex Reinvest
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) pour gagner du CRV et CVX (et tout autre jeton disponible). Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Convex Reinvest
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) para ganar CRV y CVX (y cualquier otro token disponible). Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se depositan nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.name: Convex Reinvest
de.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) to earn CRV and CVX (and any other available tokens). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Convex Reinvest
tr.description: CRV ve CVX (ve diğer mevcut jetonlar) kazanmak için [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake)'e {{token}} sağlar. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

vi.name: Convex Reinvest
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) to earn CRV and CVX (and any other available tokens). Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Convex Reinvest
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) 赚取 CRV 和 CVX （及其他代币的奖励）。收获奖励后，卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Convex Reinvest
hi.description: CRV और CVX (और कोई अन्य उपलब्ध टोकन) अर्जित करने के लिए {{token}} से [Convex Finance](https://www.convexfinance.com/stake) की आपूर्ति करता है। अर्जित टोकन काटा जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
